extendedInfo.description: Merry Christmas 2011!We know that Christmas is one of the most beautiful dates ever. We all spend time turning our homes into Christmas goodness, cooking special recipes that we're keeping for someone special, remember old songs that bring us some beautiful memories...That's why we decided to create Feel the Christmas! We give you the opportunity to bring that Christmas feeling to your Android phone!Have fun with the best Christmas multimedia gallery and what's more, you can check the best Twitter hashtags so you can feel better the Christmas feeling and new year's!The team of Crt Coders want to wish you happy holidays and a beautiful 2012!
